str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Genitive Feminine Singular
str2: Probably from the same base as massaomai and mnaomai; to disclose, i.e. Report, declare, intimate.
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A plot, design against. From a presumed compound of epi and boulomai; a plan against someone, i.e. A plot.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To send, transmit, permit to go, put forth.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Immediately, instantly, at once. From ek and the genitive case singular feminine of autos; from that hour, i.e. Instantly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To notify, command, charge, entreat solemnly. From para and the base of aggelos; to transmit a message, i.e. to enjoin.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An accuser, prosecutor. From kata and agora; against one in the assembly, i.e. A complainant at law; specially, Satan.
(a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
